meanings.definition: A marine worm of the class Echiuroidea, typically burrowing in sand or mud.
meanings.sent1: The echiuroid wriggled through the sandy seabed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of echiuroids in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The echiuroid decided to throw a sandcastle-building competition.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as an echiuroid burrowing through mud.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the echiuroid's intricate tunnels in the sand.
